Module es.grupo9
Package es.grupo9

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
es.grupo9.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Class with all the "general" functions needed (that don't specifically use Trello or Github, or need to use both).

    • exportCSV

      public static void exportCSV(TrelloManager trelloManager, GitManager gitManager) throws Exception
      Gets all the necessary information from TrelloManager and GitManager to write into an CSV file.
      Parameters:
      trelloManager - trelloManager instance.
      gitManager - gitManager instance.
      Throws:
      Exception - if GitHub user is null.
